organizations: Instagram Network Writer News Corp Australia Network Share Email
title: Calvin: Break-up rumour is ‘bulls--t’
text:
Calvin: Break-up rumour is ‘bulls--t’ 8:33 AM Network Writer PICTURES of him leaving a seedy massage parlour have sent social media into overdrive with break-up rumours. Now Calvin Harris has fired back. ‘Grub’: Beau Ryan cops fresh backlash 8:03 AM Soraiya Fuda and staff writers BEAU Ryan has copped a fresh wave of criticism after posting a photo of his wife Kara on Facebook, amid suggestions of an affair. Mulligan reveals sex of first child 8:02 AM Staff Writers CAREY Mulligan and her husband Marcus Mumford welcomed their first child together recently, and the actress has finally spilled on the baby’s gender. ‘I’m the brains behind Beyonce’s success’ 7:25 AM Derrick Bryson Taylor and Network Writers SOMEONE very close to singer Beyonce is taking credit for her superstardom — and is even offering bootcamps for Queen Bey wannabes. Ex-Biggest Loser star’s stunning bikini pics 7:00 AM Charlotte Willis SHE’S been one of TBL’s biggest success stories, and Alison Braun has proved she’s looking fitter than ever seven years after appearing on the show. ‘It’s a very dangerous mix’ 6:50 AM Emily Moulton LAST night’s edition of Q&A dealt with the radicalisation of young Muslims. According to this man, our approach to the issue needs to change. Party boy Scott Disick’s sad confession 6:20 AM Jaclyn Hendricks and Network Writers AMID cheating allegations and non-stop partying, Scott Disick has confessed to his ex-girlfriend, Kourtney Kardashian, he’s emotionally broken. Calvin Harris slams Taylor Swift break-up rumours after Thai massage parlour visit October 13, 2015 7:43am Anger ... Taylor Swift and Calvin Harris have slammed break-up rumours. Picture: Instagram Network Writer News Corp Australia Network Share Email a friend 
TAYLOR Swift has reportedly dumped her DJ boyfriend Calvin Harris after he was caught leaving a Thai massage parlour. 
The pop superstar is said to have ended their six-month relationship after Harris was photographed emerging from a seedy massage parlour on Hollywood’s Sunset Strip, Radar Online reports. 
The Scottish DJ — who is worth about $110 million — was pictured leaving the $40-per-hour massage salon, described by Radar as a “happy endings” parlour, after a two-hour visit. ‘Defamed’ ... Harris is furious at media reports that implied he was not just at the massage parlour for a massage. Source: Supplied 
An outraged Harris fired back after social media went into overdrive, issuing a statement on Twitter. 
“It’s not going to be a ‘happy ending’ for everyone I sue for defamation of character for all these bulls--- stories bye bye,” he tweeted. 
Swift favourited the tweet from her own account. Loved up ... Taylor Swift and DJ Calvin Harris have been dating for around six months. Source: Supplied First outing ... The pair took their romance public earlier this year. Source: Supplied 
Swift’s representatives were also quick to hose down the rumours. 
Tree Paine, the star’s publicist, issued a Twitter statement slamming the break-up reports: “I’ve said it before, and I’ve said it again, do not believe Radar Online.” Perfect pair ... Calvin Harris and Taylor Swift regularly flaunted their love on Instagram. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied 
Swift’s friend Selena Gomez also denied the break-up allegations, telling radio host Cohen the rumours were “stupid”. 
“I think I would have found that out,” Gomez said when asked about the allegations. “Is that a rumour?” 
“Honestly, it’s so stupid. I’m pregnant every week, (Taylor’s) gonna be pregnant. It’s so stupid, like you can’t really read that stuff,” Selena said
